TopicTitle: Somewhat weird spacecraft thing: AKA No idea what to name it

Articles.Content:
I don't know what this is or what to call it, but this is the product of me being bored and not wanting to do something conventional. To use it, just load it up, hit space and put up the thrust, and then tilt the direction you want to fly. Press action group 1 to flip engines. I put solar panels over the "forward" cockpit to make it easier to tell direction. There are 2 versions: One with jet engines and one with rockets. The jets are more efficient and stable, but flips are awkward when the jets try to warm/thrust up fast enough. The craft is more maneuverable than it appears, and it's fun to do 180 flips and change directions. I would use pictures, but I sill haven't figured how to do it without the little error image.

Jet Version: http://www./download/nc4vdcmnlwvse0w/Idk.craft

Picutre: http://www./view/3v7bbql819oqdjh/KSP_2014_12_25_15_41_36_912.jpg

Rocket Version: http://www./download/ooxu67d5uaisc99/Idk_rocket.craft

Picutre: http://www./view/c16iqmai44i8i03/KSP_2014_12_25_15_41_47_733.jpg

Edited December 26, 2014 by BaneOfPilots

That is . . . . I dont even . . .

As for pictures, mediafire images do not embed well at all. Imgur is a popular choice. On Imgur, you click the image to get the link/detail pane, copy the direct link, and place it inside [noparse][/noparse]
Thanks! I'll just hop over to Imgur right now and post something else onto the forums (With correctly embedded images) >:3
